Headline: #81W West Lawrence Temporary Reroute at Lawrence/Lavergne
ShortDescription: #81W West Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Foster, Cicero, Lawrence, due to a street blockage near Lawrence/Lavergne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#81W West Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Foster, Cicero, Lawrence, then resume their normal route, due to a street blockage near Lawrence/Lavergne.

Allow extra travel time.
